name: Dungeon Spire
description:
Monsters are attacking your dungeon build mazes to stop them.

iI you fail they damage you and come back next wave. You can play 3 cards per wave.

Blue tiles will add armor. Press space to rotate pieces. Last as long as you can!

Press M to mute/unmute the game at any time.

GAME BY DANIEL WHIFFING

MUSIC BY PURPLE PLANET
